[00:00.00]P*$$Y Fairy(OTW) (Explicit) - Jhené Aiko
[00:02.15]Lyrics by：Julian-Quan Viet Le/Jhene Aiko Chilombo
[00:04.31]Composed by：Julian-Quan Viet Le/Jhene Aiko Chilombo
[00:06.46]Ooh wee yeah yeah yeah
[00:09.94]Yeah yeah ah yeah
[00:15.66]I know you love f**kin' me
[00:17.31]F**kin' me f**kin' me
[00:19.17]I can tell by the way you in love with me
[00:22.07]Love with me
[00:22.89]You can't get enough of me yeah
[00:26.61]Well I guess it's lookin' like you stuck with me
[00:29.50]'Cause I got you sprung off in the spring time
[00:32.49]F**k all your free time
[00:34.20]You don't need no me time
[00:36.25]That's you and me time
[00:37.78]We be gettin' so loud
[00:39.53]That d**k make my soul smile
[00:41.47]That d**k make me so d**n proud
[00:44.52]Now lay your head down on the pillow
[00:47.10]Turn the lights down real low
[00:48.99]I want you to say my name
[00:52.31]Close your eyes and let your feels go
[00:54.51]Now you're gettin' real close
[00:56.37]Baby I am on the way
[01:00.09]Now that I've got you right here
[01:07.50]I won't let you down down
[01:14.94]Don't be surprised baby it's just me
[01:17.71]Just me
[01:18.65]Don't be surprised boy when I bust it wide
[01:22.55]I hypnotize you with this p***y
[01:25.22]P***y
[01:26.12]Now you feel like you can fly
[01:28.67]I got you sprung off in the spring time
[01:31.99]F**k all your free time
[01:33.57]You don't need no me time
[01:35.69]That's you and me time
[01:37.37]We be gettin' so loud
[01:39.23]That d**k make my soul smile
[01:41.06]That d**k make me so proud ooh oh
[01:44.25]Now lay your head down on the pillow
[01:46.79]I'ma f**k you real slow
[01:48.61]Need to hear you say my name
[01:51.72]Close your eyes and let your feels go
[01:54.13]Now you're gettin' real close
[01:56.00]Baby I am on the way
[01:59.70]Now that I've got you right here
[02:07.06]I won't let you down down
[02:14.67]Don't be surprised baby it's just me
[02:17.26]Just me
[02:18.13]Don't be surprised boy when I bust it wide
[02:21.88]I hypnotize you with this p***y
[02:24.66]P***y
[02:25.60]Now you feel like you can fly
[02:28.24]I got you sprung off in the spring time
[02:31.50]F**k all your free time

data.trans:
[ti:P*$$Y Fairy(OTW) (Explicit)]
[ar:Jhené Aiko]
[al:P*$$Y Fairy (OTW)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.15]//
[00:04.30]//
[00:06.46]//
[00:09.94]//
[00:15.66]我知道你喜欢与我纵享欢愉
[00:17.31]与我纵享欢愉
[00:19.17]我从你真心爱我的样子就能知道答案
[00:22.07]真心爱着我
[00:22.89]你对我欲罢不能
[00:26.61]我想这就像是你迷恋着我
[00:29.50]因为我让你在春日里心神荡漾
[00:32.49]对你的闲暇时光不屑一顾
[00:34.20]你不需要独处时间
[00:36.25]你与我共度美好时光
[00:37.78]我们欢欣雀跃
[00:39.53]**让我们发自肺腑地微笑
[00:41.47]**让我倍感骄傲
[00:44.52]现在你惬意地躺在枕头上
[00:47.10]将灯光调暗
[00:48.99]我想让你呼唤着我的名字
[00:52.31]闭上你的眼睛 随心而动
[00:54.51]现在你越靠越近
[00:56.37]宝贝 我渐入佳境
[01:00.09]现在我有你陪在我的身边
[01:07.50]我不会让你失望
[01:14.94]不要感到惊讶 宝贝 只是我而已
[01:17.71]只有我
[01:18.65]不要感到惊讶 男孩 当我对你敞开心扉
[01:22.55]我散发着独特魅力 让你心醉神迷
[01:25.22]//
[01:26.12]现在你觉得自己飘飘欲仙
[01:28.67]我让你在春日时分里心神荡漾
[01:31.99]对你的闲暇时光不屑一顾
[01:33.57]你不需要独处时间
[01:35.69]你与我共度美好时光
[01:37.37]我们欢欣雀跃
[01:39.23]**让我们发自肺腑地微笑
[01:41.06]**让我倍感骄傲
[01:44.25]现在你惬意地躺在枕头上
[01:46.79]我会放慢速度 与你纵享欢
[01:48.61]我需要听到你呼唤我的名字
[01:51.72]闭上你的眼睛 随心而动
[01:54.13]现在你越靠越近
[01:56.00]宝贝 我渐入佳境

[02:17.26]只有我
